descriptionHtml:
*****************************************************************

	                TES: Skyrim
	          LFox Improved Shouts v1.0
			 Made by LFox

*****************************************************************

     1. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN

*****************************************************************

1. Extract the mod to the Data folder and enable it via the
launcher or mod manager.

*****************************************************************

     2. Mod Load Order

*****************************************************************

This plugin should be fine anywhere in your load order.  It will
be incompatible with anything that modifies shouts cooldowns or
in the master.esp\'s case anything that also modifies the effects
of the listed shouts.

*****************************************************************

     3. Mod Description

*****************************************************************

This mod comes in two versions.  One which simply reduces shout
cooldowns to 3, 6, 9 seconds to allow you to mix and match shouts
while fighting.

The other changes a few shouts to increase the damage to make
them useful on master difficulty at high levels.

Enable only one.

LFox Improved Shouts.esp
Changes shout cooldowns to 3, 6, 9 seconds.

LFox Improved Shouts Master.esp
Changes shout cooldowns to 3, 6, 9 seconds.
Tweaks a few shouts to be useful on master difficulty.

WARNING: All 20 shouts have had their cooldowns modified.  However
ones such as Call Dragon, Elemental Fury or Storm Call may cause
problems if used too early again.  Try to wait for the effect to
expire.  ESPECIALLY Elemental Fury it\'s already glitchy without
mods.  You have been warned.

LFox Improved Shouts Master.esp Tweaks
**************************************

The damage for shouts is twice what it would be since there is
a 50% reduction to player damage on master difficulty.  I
tweaked the damage amounts so you shouldn\'t need more than 2-3
shots of a lvl 3 shout to take down a tough enemy.

Fire Breath

Level 1 - Damage changed from 50 to 400

Level 2 - Damage changed from 70 to 600

Level 3 - Damage changed from 90 to 800

Frost Breath

Level 1 - Damage changed from 10 dmg/sec for 5 seconds to 
40 dmg/sec for 5 seconds

Level 2 - Damage changed from 14 dmg/sec for 5 seconds to
80 dmg/sec for 5 seconds

Level 3 - Damage changed from 18 dmg/sec for 5 seconds to
120 dmg/sec for 5 seconds

Marked for Death

Level 1 - Damage changed from Damage Health 1 pt/sec to
Damage Health 2 pt/sec, armor unchanged

Level 2 - Damage changed from Damage Health 2 pt/sec to
Damage Health 4 pt/sec, armor unchanged

Level 3 - Damage changed from Damage Health 3 pt/sec to
Damage Health 6 pt/sec, armor unchanged

*****************************************************************

     4. Version History

*****************************************************************

v1.0
- Made the plugin
